event.description: B. J. Upton grounds out, third baseman Mike Lowell to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Carl Crawford singles on a line drive to left fielder Jason Bay.
With Evan Longoria batting, Carl Crawford steals (21) 2nd base.
Evan Longoria walks.
Carlos Pena called out on strikes.
Pat Burrell singles on a line drive to left fielder Jason Bay. Carl Crawford scores. Evan Longoria to 2nd.
Gabe Gross flies out to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury.
Akinori Iwamura grounds out, shortstop Julio Lugo to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Jason Bartlett doubles (5) on a ground ball to left fielder Jason Bay.
Michel Hernandez lines into a double play, shortstop Julio Lugo to second baseman Dustin Pedroia. Jason Bartlett doubled off 2nd.
B. J. Upton grounds out, shortstop Julio Lugo to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Carl Crawford triples (2) on a fly ball to left fielder Jason Bay.
Evan Longoria out on a sacrifice fly to right fielder J. D. Drew. Carl Crawford scores.
Carlos Pena lines out to second baseman Dustin Pedroia.
Pat Burrell flies out to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury.
Gabe Gross singles on a line drive to right fielder J. D. Drew.
Akinori Iwamura grounds out, second baseman Dustin Pedroia to first baseman Jeff Bailey. Gabe Gross to 2nd.
Jason Bartlett doubles (6) on a line drive to left fielder Jason Bay. Gabe Gross scores.
Michel Hernandez grounds out, third baseman Mike Lowell to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
B. J. Upton grounds out, shortstop Julio Lugo to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Carl Crawford hits a ground-rule double (6) on a fly ball to right-center field.
Evan Longoria flies out to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury.
Carlos Pena grounds out softly, second baseman Dustin Pedroia to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Pat Burrell flies out to right fielder J. D. Drew.
Gabe Gross grounds out, third baseman Mike Lowell to first baseman Jeff Bailey.

B. J. Upton walks. Michel Hernandez to 2nd.
Pitching Change: Hideki Okajima replaces Brad Penny.
Carl Crawford flies out to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury.
Evan Longoria strikes out swinging.
Carlos Pena flies out to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury.
Pat Burrell walks.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Ben Zobrist replaces Gabe Gross.
Pitching Change: Ramon Ramirez replaces Hideki Okajima.
Ben Zobrist grounds into a force out, second baseman Dustin Pedroia to shortstop Julio Lugo. Pat Burrell out at 2nd. Ben Zobrist to 1st.
Akinori Iwamura grounds out to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Pitching Change: Jonathan Papelbon replaces Ramon Ramirez.
Jason Bartlett singles on a sharp line drive to left fielder Jason Bay.
With Michel Hernandez batting, Jason Bartlett advances to 2nd on defensive indifference.
Michel Hernandez flies out to right fielder J. D. Drew. Jason Bartlett to 3rd.

Carl Crawford called out on strikes.
Jacoby Ellsbury grounds out, shortstop Jason Bartlett to first baseman Carlos Pena.

Jason Bay flies out to right fielder Gabe Gross.

J. D. Drew strikes out swinging.

Jason Varitek grounds out softly to first baseman Carlos Pena.
Julio Lugo strikes out swinging.

Dustin Pedroia flies out to right fielder Gabe Gross.

Mike Lowell singles on a fly ball to left fielder Carl Crawford. Jason Bay to 3rd. Mike Lowell out at 2nd, left fielder Carl Crawford to second baseman Akinori Iwamura.

Jason Bay homers (9) on a fly ball to left field. Dustin Pedroia scores. David Ortiz scores.

J. D. Drew homers (4) on a fly ball to right field. Mike Lowell scores.
